TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DelayedConstraint extends NUnit.Framework.Constraints.PrefixConstraint

Docs.summary: Applies a delay to the match so that a match can be evaluated in the future.

Docs.param: The delegate whose value is to be tested
Docs.summary: Test whether the constraint is satisfied by a delegate
Docs.returns: True for if the base constraint fails, false if it succeeds

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool Matches (ref bool actual);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Matches(bool actual) cil managed

Docs.param: A reference to the value to be tested
Docs.summary: Test whether the constraint is satisfied by a given boolean reference. Overridden to wait for the specified delay period before calling the base constraint with the dereferenced value.
Docs.returns: True for success, false for failure

Docs.summary: Test whether the constraint is satisfied by a given value
Docs.returns: True for if the base constraint fails, false if it succeeds
